newsitem.title: USA: UNR Industries financial officer to retire.
newsitem.headline: UNR Industries financial officer to retire.

text.p: UNR Industries Inc said Monday that Henry Grey, senior vice president, chief financial officer and treasurer will retire June 30 and form an investment firm specializing in midwest distressed manufacturing companies.
Grey has been chief financial officer since 1986.
Rodney Harrison, chief financial officer of the ROHN Division of UNR, was appointed the additional duties as vice president and treasurer of UNR, effective July 1.
UNR, through its ROHN Division, makes and installs towers, shelters, cabinets for the telecommunications industry.
